entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6 except low minus 11 north of Cape Ray.
